title: Episode 28: How To (Actually) Be There For Someone
description:
We all want to be there for the people we care about. Sometimes we don’t know how to actually do this. Or we feel uncomfortable even trying. In this episode, we share ways to support the people you love in the way that feels best for them. Get ready to have deeper relationships that feel more connected, and be sure to share this with the people closest to you in your life.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/006301209X

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012
